title: What the actual F**K
body: What is wrong with your ranking system riot. Last season i ended in silver 4 with i think 45lp. I just finished my provisionals and went 8-2 AND GOT SILVER 5. Why is it that i win 80% of my games and get DEMOTED. This is a problem that needs to be fixed. It happened last season aswell and im over it.

replies.body: Ranked is too serious in my opinion, stick to normals lol
When you think about it you went 8-2 and got Silver 5 and those AFKing/Feeding %%%%lords that ruin your games are probably going 2-8 and get placed in low Bronze so it's pretty good in a way.

S4 to S5 isn't even a big drop. Sure, it would be cool if you started higher, but there as a soft reset, meaning your MMR was lowered, for one thing. I would be pissed off if I went S5 to B4 or something, but this is nothing.
If you truly deserved it, you will proceed to climb back to it.
But thats not the point, why make people play promos if they are not going to get ranked accordingly

a) it's generally called Provisionals.
b) people are getting ranked properly, the biggest thing this is doing, is moving those that DON'T deserve to be a higher tier down, yes it means that the people who may deserve higher have to climb again, but that's the thing YOU CAN CLIMB IF YOU DESERVE IT.
